tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulatory_licenses (
    license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    license_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    license_number VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE,
    issue_date DATE,
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE exchanges (
  exchange_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  license_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  license_issued_date DATE,
  license_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE businesses (
  business_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  owner_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  license_number VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  license_issued_date DATE,
  license_expiry_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_exchanges (
  exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_name VARCHAR(50),
  license_number VARCHAR(20),
  license_type VARCHAR(30),
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE business_licenses (
  license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(50),
  owner_name VARCHAR(50),
  license_type VARCHAR(30),
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE license_authorities (
  authority_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  authority_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(50),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(15),
  location_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Regulatory_Licenses (
  license_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  license_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Exchange_Licenses (
  license_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  license_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Business_Licenses (
  license_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  license_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Individual_Licenses (
  license_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  license_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  regulatory_body VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE regulatory_licenses (
  license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  exchange_name VARCHAR(255),
  license_type VARCHAR(50),
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE business_licenses (
  license_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(255),
  license_type VARCHAR(50),
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
);
